Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small BarInverseMonoid AllSmallBarInverseMonoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic BarInverseMonoid of orders 2 to 7.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallBarInverseMonoid">
The output barinversemonoid are represented by its operation table for *, a, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small BarInverseMonoid
"IsASmallBarInverseMonoid" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic BarInverseMonoid of orders 2 to 7. It returns true if the model is a Small BarInverseMonoid, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallBarInverseMonoid">
